name: @jaredlunde/react-form-field
description: A basic FormField state container for React
author: Jared Lunde

scripts.build: yarn run build:es && yarn run build:cjs
scripts.build:es: rm -rf es && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=es babel src --out-dir es && npm run prettier:es
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf cjs && cross-env NODE_ENV=production cross-env BABEL_ENV=cjs babel src --out-dir cjs && npm run prettier:cjs
scripts.build-pub: yarn run build && yarn publish --access public
